      float getCenterX()
      The method get's the center x position of the bounding box, this is set automatically using the getX() and getWidth().

      The method get's the center y position of the bounding box, this is set automatically using the getY() and getHeight().
      float getHeight()
      The method return the height of the bounding box the height is automatically set for a polygon bounding box however a rectangle bounding box can be set by casting this bounding box object as rectangle bounding box

      • checkAreaCollision

        public static boolean checkAreaCollision(Engine2DPolygonBoundingBox polyBox1,
                                         Engine2DPolygonBoundingBox polyBox2)
        The method checks if there is a collision between two 2D polygon using area collision
        Parameters:
        polyBox1 - a polygon bounding box
        polyBox2 - another polygon bounding box
        Returns:
        if there is a collision between the two

      • checkAreaCollision

        public static boolean checkAreaCollision(Engine2DPolygonBoundingBox polyBox,
                                         Engine2DRectangleBoundingBox rec)
        The method check if there is collision between a polygon shape and a rectangle bounding box using area collision
        Parameters:
        polyBox - a polygon bounding box object
        rec - a rectangle bounding box object
        Returns:
        if a collision exists

      • moveX

        public void moveX(int block,
                  float multiplier)
        Move the bounding box in the x axis
        Parameters:
        block - the block in pixels to move in
        multiplier - the multiplier

        public float getX(int block,
                  int offset)
        Parameters:
        block - the block size
        offset - the offset for the block
        Returns:
        the exact x position using the block size and offset

      • setX

        public final void setX(float x)
        The method set the x position of the bounding box if the bounding box is an instance of polygon bounding box then it will also move the polygon
        Parameters:
        x - the x position to set to

      • setX

        public void setX(int block,
                 int offset)
        The method set the x position of the bounding box to an exact position using the block and offset if the bounding box is an instance of polygon bounding box then it will also move the polygon
        Parameters:
        block - the block size
        offset - the offset from the position using the block size

        Parameters:

      • setY

        public void setY(int block,
                 int offset)
        The method set the y position of the bounding box to an exact position using the block and offset if the bounding box is an instance of polygon bounding box then it will also move the polygon
        Parameters:
        block - the block size
        offset - the offset from the position using the block size

      • getWidth

        public float getWidth()
        The method return the width of the bounding box the width is automatically set for a polygon bounding box however a rectangle bounding box can be set by casting this bounding box object as rectangle bounding box
        Returns:
        the width of the bounding box
        See Also:
        setWidth(float)

      • getHeight

        public float getHeight()
        The method return the height of the bounding box the height is automatically set for a polygon bounding box however a rectangle bounding box can be set by casting this bounding box object as rectangle bounding box
        Returns:
        the width of the bounding box
        See Also:
        setHeight(float)

      • getCenterX

        public final float getCenterX()
        The method get's the center x position of the bounding box, this is set automatically using the getX() and getWidth(). The centerX is automatically calculated whenever you move or setX(float) or setWidth(float)
        Returns:
        the center x position of the BoundingBox

      • getCenterY

        public final float getCenterY()
        The method get's the center y position of the bounding box, this is set automatically using the getY() and getHeight(). The centerY is automatically calculated whenever you move or setY(float) or setHeight(float)
        Returns:
        the center y position of the BoundingBox
